reuters.title: MAYFAIR SUPER MARKETS INC <MYFRA> 2ND QTR NET
reuters.body: Qtr ends Feb 28 Shr Class A 61 cts vs 48 cts Shr Class B 59 cts vs 46 cts Net 2,358,000 vs 1,876,000 Revs 122,508,000 vs 105,871,000 Six mths Shr Class A 1.15 dlrs vs 86 cts Shr Class B 1.13 dlrs vs 84 cts Net 4,485,000 vs 3,378,000 Revs 242,453,000 vs 210,117,000 NOTE: qtr and six mths prior figures reflect two-for-one stock split in August 1986. Reuter 
